title: Chidiya Udd
overview: The series revolves around Seher, a resilient 20-year-old from Rajasthan, who dares to dream beyond the confines of her circumstances. Fueled by ambition and a determination to redefine her destiny, Seher journeys to Mumbai, the city of dreams, but soon discovers its darker, grittier side. She dreams of becoming the best prostitute in Mumbai's infamous red light district, Kamathipura. However, her journey isn't that easy. Seher has stepped into Qadir Khan's den and now its a fight to survive. Will Seher fulfil her dreams and fight against the King of Kamathipura?
